title: Psychoanalytic Approach for Diagnosing Organizational Learning Obstacles

context.prior_knowledge: Fundamental concepts of organizational learning and basic psychology understanding
context.additional_context: Training for current professionals on analyzing organizational learning barriers through psychoanalytic theory

learning_goals: Diagnose at least three behavioral obstacles in organizational learning processes based on psychoanalytic theory.
Identify at least two cases of "arrogant organizational disorder" within organizations by adapting DSM-IV criteria.
Propose solutions for learning obstacles applicable to real organizational settings through project-based assessments.
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
